title: fix(social): commit images to GitHub for stable Buffer URLs
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updates social media automation to commit generated images directly to the repository for stable access.
gist.impact: Fixes image fetching errors in Buffer and ensures reliable post scheduling.
gist.visual_concept: The social media bot (robot bee) securing an image file into a permanent folder (GitHub) rather than holding it dynamically. Stability and persistence.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a robot bee carefully placing a polaroid photo into a secure file folder. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'SAVED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
